[sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([a, sexually, dimorphic, difference, in, mouse, hepatic, cholesterol, homeostasis, and, roles, for, estrogen, in, the, regulation, of, cholesterol, 'uptake,', 'biosynthesis,', and, catabolism, in, the, 'female,', but, not, in, the, male])].
[sujeto(['Small', heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', is, an, orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, can, modulate, the, activity, of, several, transcription, factors])].
[sujeto(['Estrogens', are, here, shown, to, directly]), verbo([induce]), complemento([expression, of, the, 'SHP', in, the, mouse, and, rat, liver, and, in, human, 'HepG2', cells])].
[sujeto(['SHP', is, rapidly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([within, 2, h, following, treatment, of, mice, with, ethynylestradiol, '(', 'EE)', or, the, estrogen, receptor, alpha, '(', 'ERalpha)-selective', compound, propyl, pyrazole, triol, '(', 'PPT)'])].
[sujeto(['Mutation', of, the, human, 'SHP', promoter, defined, 'HNF-3,', 'HNF-4,', 'GATA,', and, 'AP-1', sites, as, important, for, basal, 'activity,', whereas, 'EE', induction]), verbo([required]), complemento([two, distinct, elements, located, between, -, 309, and, -, 267])].
[sujeto(['One', of, these, elements, contains, an, estrogen, response, element, 'half-site', that]), verbo([bound]), complemento([purified, 'ERalpha,', and, 'ERalpha', with, a, mutated, 'DNA', binding, domain, was, unable, to, stimulate, 'SHP', promoter, activity])].
[sujeto(['This', 'ERalpha']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, overlaps, the, known, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', binding, site, in, the, 'SHP', 'promoter,', and, the, combination, of, 'EE', plus, 'FXR', agonists, did, not, produce, an, additive, induction, of, 'SHP', expression, in, mice])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', induction, of, 'SHP', by, 'EE', did, not]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([expression, of, the, known, 'SHP', target, genes, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', or, sterol, 12, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP8B1)'])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, direct, regulation, of, 'SHP', expression, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, basis, for, some, of, the, numerous, biological, effects, of, estrogens])].
[sujeto(['Bile', acids]), verbo([activate]), complemento([a, nuclear, 'receptor,', farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR),', that, induces, bile, salt, export, pump, '(', 'BSEP)', but, inhibits, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', gene, transcription, in, the, liver])].
[sujeto(['Guggulsterone,', a, plant, sterol, that, lowers, serum, 'cholesterol,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, antagonize, 'FXR', activated, genes])].
[sujeto(['Transient', transfection, assay, of, a, human, 'BSEP/luciferase', reporter, in, 'HepG2', cells, transfected, with, 'FXR']), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, guggulsterone, strongly, antagonizes, bile, acid, induction, of, the, 'BSEP', gene])].
[sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', guggulsterone]), verbo([has]), complemento([no, effect, on, 'FXR', inhibition, of, the, 'CYP7A1', 'gene,', but, strongly, inhibits, the, human, 'CYP7A1', gene, by, activation, of, pregnane, 'X', receptor, '(', 'PXR)'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, guggulsterone, inhibits, bile, acid, secretion, from, hepatocytes, into, bile, and, activates, 'PXR', to, inhibit, bile, acid, synthesis, in, the, liver])].
[sujeto(['Reduced', conversion, of, cholesterol, and, bile, acid, excretion, may]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, an, increase, of, hepatic, cholesterol, and, decrease, of, intestinal, cholesterol, 'absorption,', and, results, in, lowering, serum, cholesterol])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', in, the, current, 'study,', using, real, time, 'PCR', we, compared, the, mRNA, expression, of, 'ABC', transporters, and, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, regulation, of, cholesterol, metabolism, in, liver, 'parenchymal,', 'endothelial,', and, 'Kupffer', cells])].
[sujeto(['Liver', endothelial, cells, show, a, high, expression, of, cholesterol, 27, -, 'hydroxylase,', liver, 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXR)beta,', 'PPARdelta,', and, 'ABCG1,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, novel, specific, role, for, these, genes, in, endothelial, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', 'Kupffer', 'cells,', the, expression, level, of, 'LXRalpha,', 'ABCA1,', and, in, particular, 'ABCG1', is, 'high,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, an, 'ABCG1', mRNA, expression, level, that, is, 70, -, fold, higher, than, in, parenchymal, cells])].
[sujeto(['It', can, be, calculated, that, 51, '%', of, the, total, liver, 'ABCG1', expression, resides, in, 'Kupffer', cells, and, 24, '%', in, endothelial, 'cells,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([an, 'intrahepatic-specific', role, for, 'ABCG1', in, 'Kupffer', and, endothelial, cells])].
[sujeto(['Because', of, a, specific, stimulation, of, 'ABCG1', in, parenchymal, cells, by, a, high, cholesterol, 'diet,', the, contribution, of, parenchymal, cells, to, the, total, liver]), verbo([increased]), complemento([from, 25, to, 60, '%'])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, hepatic, bile, salt, transporters, is, partly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, bile, salts, via, activation, of, nuclear, farnesoid, 'X-activated', receptor, '(', 'Fxr)'])].
[sujeto(['Bile', salt, flux, was, manipulated, by, dietary, supplementation, with, taurocholate, '(', 0.5, '%', 'w/w)', or, cholestyramine, '(', 2, '%', 'w/w)', or, by, disruption, of, the, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase-gene', '(', 'Cyp7A(-/-)', 'mice)']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, reduced, bile, salt, pool, size])].
[sujeto(['Biliary', bile, salt, secretion, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['(', +, 350, '%', ')', or, decreased, '(', -, 50, '%', ')', after, taurocholate, or, cholestyramine, 'feeding,', 'respectively,', but, plasma, bile, salt, concentrations, and, hepatic, 'Fxr', expression, were, not, affected])].
[sujeto(['Large', variations, in, hepatic, bile, salt, flux]), verbo([have]), complemento([minor, effects, on, expression, of, murine, 'Ntcp', and, 'Bsep', in, 'vivo,', suggesting, that, these, transporters, are, abundantly, expressed, and, able, to, accommodate, a, wide, range, of, '\'', 'physiological\'', bile, salt, fluxes])].
[sujeto(['Two', 'ATP-binding', cassette, transporter, 'proteins,', 'ABCA1', and, 'ABCG1,', may]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([an, active, efflux, of, cellular, cholesterol, and, phospholipids])].
[sujeto(['They', are, ubiquitously]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([and, are, subject, to, regulation, by, cholesterol, loading, or, by, treatment, with, agents, that, activate, the, nuclear, hormone, receptor, 'LXR'])].
[sujeto(['Earlier', studies, in, both, primates, and, 'non-primates']), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, treatment, with, endotoxin, '(', bacterial, 'lipopolysaccharide,', 'LPS)', reduces, plasma, levels, of, 'HDL', cholesterol])].
[sujeto(['LPS', treatment]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, 'rapid,', 'dose-dependent', increase, of, 'ABCA1', but, not, 'ABCG1', mRNA, expression])].
[sujeto(['Analysis', of, mouse, livers, showed, that, 'LPS', treatment]), verbo([decreases]), complemento([expression, of, 'CYP7A,', another, target, gene, of, 'LXR'])].
[sujeto(['When', 'THP-1', cells, were, transfected, with, the, 'ABCA1', promoter, construct, '(', -, 928, to, +, 101, 'bp),', promoter, activity, was, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, treatment, of, 22, '(', 'R)-hydroxycholesterol', but, not, by, 'LPS'])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, studies, show, that, 'LPS']), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['ABCA1', expression, through, an, 'LXR-independent', mechanism])].
[sujeto(['Further', studies, showed, that, treatment, with, 'Rhodobacter', sphaeroiders, 'LPS,', an, 'LPS', 'antagonist,', or, 'PD169316,', a, specific, p38, 'MAP', kinase, 'inhibitor,']), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, induction, of, 'ABCA1', by, 'LPS'])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', this]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, both, transport, of, 'LPS', from, the, plasma, membrane, to, an, intracellular, site, and, activation, of, p38, 'MAP', kinase, are, involved, in, the, 'LPS-mediated', induction, of, 'ABCA1'])].
[sujeto(['Unlike', 'macrophages,', the, hepatic, parenchymal, cells]), verbo([express]), complemento(['cholesterol-7', 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', which, regulates, the, conversion, of, cholesterol, into, bile, 'acids,', the, major, quantitative, pathway, maintaining, cholesterol, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['We', examined, if, 'CYP7A1', expression, in, 'RAW', 264.7, macrophages, could]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([the, accumulation, of, cholesterol, when, they, were, incubated, with, 'acetyl-LDL'])].
[sujeto(['A', single, cell, clone, '(', designated, as, 7, alphaRAW, 'cells)', that, stably]), verbo([expresses]), complemento([rat, 'CYP7A1', displayed, similar, rates, of, growth, as, 'non-transfected', 'RAW', cells])].
[sujeto(['The', 'CYP7A1', enzymatic, activity]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([by, microsomes, obtained, from, 7, alphaRAW, cells, was, similar, to, that, expressed, by, microsomes, obtained, from, mouse, liver])].
[sujeto(['Incubating', 'non-transfected', 'RAW', with]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([amounts, of, 'acetyl-LDL', caused, a, parallel, accumulation, of, 'cholesterol,', whereas, 7, alphaRAW, cells, displayed, a, complete, resistance, to, cholesterol, accumulation])].
[sujeto([7, alphaRAW, cells, displayed]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, both, 'ABCA1', mRNA, '(', 3.1, -, 'fold,', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.001, ')', and, 'ABCG1', mRNA, '(', 2.2, -, 'fold,', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')', ',', whereas, the, expression, of, scavenger, receptor, class, 'A', mRNA, was, unchanged])].
[sujeto([7, alphaRAW, cells, also, displayed, small, but, significant]), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, the, rate, of, efflux, of, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]cholesterol', to, both, delipidated, apolipoprotein, 'A1', and, to, 'HDL'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'CYP7A1', expression, in, 'RAW', cultured, macrophages]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, accumulation, of, cholesterol, from, 'acetyl-LDL', via, both, increased, metabolism, and, efflux, of, cholesterol])].
[sujeto(['The', orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, receptor, liver, receptor, homologous, 'protein-1', '(', 'LRH-1;', 'NR5A2,', also, known, as, 'FTF),', an, unusual, receptor, that, binds, 'DNA', as, a, 'monomer,', is, an, essential, regulator, of, expression, of, a, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, in, bile, acid, 'formation,', cholesterol, 7, -, 'alpha-hydroxylase'])].
[sujeto(['In', a, classic, negative, feedback, loop, that, is, a, crucial, component, of, the, complex, regulation, of, cholesterol, 'metabolism,', cholesterol, 7, -, 'alpha-hydroxylase', expression, is]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([when, bile, acid, levels, are, high])].
[sujeto(['This', repression, is, thought, to, be, based, on, the, bile, 'acid-dependent', induction, of, expression, of, the, orphan, receptor, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', 'NR0B2,', which]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, activity, of, 'LRH-1'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([explored, the, molecular, basis, for, this, important, regulatory, effect, by, characterizing, the, mechanisms, by, which, mouse, and, human, 'SHP', inhibit, 'LRH-1-mediated', transactivation])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'SHP', proteins, specifically]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, 'AF-2', transactivation, domain, of, 'LRH-1', both, in, vivo, and, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['This', domain, is, a, common]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, coactivator, 'interaction,', and, the, 'SHP', proteins, can, compete, with, p160, coactivators, for, binding, to, 'LRH-1'])].
[sujeto(['Neither', a, deletion, nor, a, point, mutation, specifically, affecting, this, domain, blocked, the, ability, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'LRH-1', to, compete, for, coactivator, binding, or, to, repress, 'LRH-1', transactivation])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, relative, ability, of, these, mutants, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['LRH-1-mediated', transactivation, was, markedly, decreased])].
[sujeto(['During', fasting, and, in, type, 'I', 'diabetes,', elevated, levels, of, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, 'gamma-coactivator-1alpha', '(', 'PGC-1alpha)']), verbo([induce]), complemento([expression, of, the, 'Cyp7A1', gene, and, overexpression, of, 'PGC-1alpha', in, hepatoma, cells, stimulates, bile, acid, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'Ad-PGC-1alpha-RNA', interference, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([acute, disruption, of, 'PGC-1alpha', in, 'mice,', here, we, show, that, 'PGC-1alpha', is, necessary, for, 'fasting-mediated', induction, of, 'CYP7A1'])].
[sujeto(['Co-immunoprecipitation', and, promoter, activation, studies]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, the, induction, of, 'CYP7A1', is, mediated, by, direct, interaction, between, 'PGC-1alpha', and, the, 'AF2', domain, of, liver, receptor, 'homolog-1', '(', 'LRH-1)'])].
[sujeto(['We', also, show, that, transactivation, of, 'PGC-1alpha', and, 'LRH-1', is]), verbo([repressed]), complemento([by, the, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)'])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', of, mice, with, 'GW4064,', a, synthetic, agonist, for, farnesoid, 'X', 'receptor,']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['SHP', expression, and, decreased, both, the, recruitment, of, 'PGC-1alpha', to, the, 'Cyp7A1', promoter, and, the, 'fasting-induced', expression, of, 'CYP7A1', mRNA])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'PGC-1alpha', is, an, important, 'co-activator', for, 'LRH-1', and, that, 'SHP', targets, the, interaction, between, 'LRH-1', and, 'PGC-1alpha', to, inhibit, 'CYP7A1', expression])].
[sujeto(['Overall,', these, studies]), verbo([provide]), complemento([further, evidence, for, the, important, role, of, 'PGC-1alpha', in, bile, acid, homeostasis, and, suggest, that, pharmacological, targeting, of, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, in, vivo, can, be, used, to, reverse, the, increase, in, 'CYP7A1', associated, with, adverse, metabolic, conditions])].
[sujeto(['Literature']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, glucocorticoid, '(', 'GC)', exposure, during, early, life, may, have, 'long-term', consequences, into, adult, life])].
[sujeto(['DEX', acutely]), verbo([induced]), complemento([hepatic, mRNA, levels, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'Cyp7a1),', cholesterol, 27, -, hydroxylase, '(', 'Cyp27),', and, in, particular, sterol, 12, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'Cyp8b1),', whereas, expression, of, the, bile, acid, transporters, bile, salt, export, pump, '(', 'Bsep)', and, sodium, taurocholate, cotransporting, polypeptide, '(', 'Ntcp)', was, moderately, affected])].
[sujeto(['Neonatal', 'DEX', administration]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, increased, bilary, lipid, 'secretion,', decreased, 'Cyp8B1', mRNA, expression, and, a, 3, -, fold, higher, 'Cyp7a1/Cyp8b1', mRNA, ratio, in, rats, at, week, 8, compared, with, 'age-matched', controls, without, alterations, in, bile, acid, kinetics])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', neonatal, 'DEX', administration]), verbo([causes]), complemento([altered, gene, expressions, later, in, life, that, are, not, translated, into, quantitative, changes, in, bile, acid, kinetics])].
[sujeto(['Maximal', bile, acid, secretory, rates, and, expression, of, bile, acid, transporters, in, liver, and, ileum, are]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'lactation,', possibly, to, facilitate, increased, enterohepatic, recirculation, of, bile, acids])].
[sujeto(['The', bile, acid, pool]), verbo([increased]), complemento([1.9, to, 2.5, -, fold, '[', postpartum, '(', 'PP)', days, 10, ',', 14, ',', and, 19, -, 23, ']', ',', compared, with, controls])].
[sujeto(['A', 1.5, -, fold]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, cholic, acids, and, a, 14, to, 20, '%', decrease, in, muricholic, acids, in, lactation, significantly, increased, the, hydrophobicity, index])].
[sujeto(['A', 2.8, -, fold]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'Cyp7a1', mRNA, expression, at, 16, h, '(', 10, h, of, 'light)', demonstrated, a, shift, in, the, diurnal, rhythm, at, day, 10, 'PP;', 'Cyp7a1', protein, expression, and, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', activity, were, significantly, increased, at, this, time, and, remained, elevated, at, day, 14, 'PP', but, decreased, to, control, levels, by, day, 21, 'PP'])].
[sujeto(['There', was, an, overall]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'Cyp27a1', mRNA, expression, and, a, 20, '%', decrease, in, 'Cyp27a1', protein, 'expression,', but, there, was, no, change, in, 'Cyp8b1', mRNA, or, protein, expression, at, day, 10, 'PP'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'Cyp7a1', expression, 'PP', provides, a, mechanism, for, the, increase, in, the, bile, acid, pool])].
[sujeto(['Liver', receptor, homolog, 1, '(', 'LRH-1)', is, a, key, transcriptional, factor]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, hepatic, expression, of, 'CYP7A1'])].
[sujeto(['We', hypothesized, that, 'LRH-1', was, also]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, transcriptional, regulation, of, 'BSEP'])].
[sujeto(['In', support, of, our, 'hypothesis,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, overexpression, of, 'LRH-1', 'induced,', whereas, knockdown, of, 'LRH-1', 'decreased,', 'BSEP', expression])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', such, transactivation, by, 'LRH-1', was]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, maximal, induction, of, 'BSEP', expression, through, the, bile, 'acid/farnesoid', 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', activation, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Bioinformatic', and, mutational, analysis]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, identification, of, a, functional, liver, receptor, homolog, 1, -, responsive, element, '(', 'LRHRE)', in, the, 'BSEP', promoter])].
[sujeto(['Specific']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'LRH-1', to, the, 'LRHRE', and, recruitment, of, 'LRH-1', to, the, 'BSEP', promoter, were, demonstrated, by, electrophoretic, mobility, shift, assay, and, chromatin, immunoprecipitation, 'assay,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', 'LRH-1', transcriptionally]), verbo([activated]), complemento([the, 'BSEP', promoter, and, functioned, as, a, modulator, in, bile, 'acid/FXR-mediated', 'BSEP', regulation])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'LRH-1', plays, a, supporting, role, to, 'FXR', in, maintaining, hepatic, bile, acid, levels, by, coordinately, regulating, 'CYP7A1', and, 'BSEP', for, bile, acid, synthesis, and, 'elimination,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Androgens']), verbo([increase]), complemento([muscle, 'mass,', decrease, fat, 'mass,', and, reduce, 'high-density', lipoprotein, cholesterol, '(', 'HDL),', but, the, relationship, between, body, 'composition,', lipoprotein, 'metabolism,', and, androgens, has, not, been, explained])].
[sujeto(['Nuclear', magnetic, resonance, analysis, revealed, that, 'DHT', 'dose-dependently', reduced, the, cholesterol, content, of, large, 'HDL', particles, and]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([mean, 'HDL', particle, size, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')', and, also, tended, to, lower, 'low-density', lipoprotein, cholesterol, without, altering, other, lipoprotein, particles])].
[sujeto(['In', 'liver,', 'DHT', did, not, alter, the, expression, of, most, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, cholesterol, synthesis, or, uptake, but, rapidly, increased, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', 'RNA,', along, with, concomitant, repression, of, 'CYP7A1,', a, target, of, 'SHP', transcriptional, repression, and, the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, in, bile, acid, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['DHT', regulation, of, 'SHP', and, 'CYP7A1', also, occurs, in, 'rats,', indicating, a]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([mechanism])].
[sujeto(['In', adipose, 'tissue,', pathway, analyses]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([coordinate, regulation, of, 'adipogenesis,', tissue, 'remodeling,', and, lipid, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['Genes', encoding, 'IGF-I', and, 'beta-catenin', were, 'induced,', as, were, extracellular, 'matrix,', cell, 'adhesion,', and, cytoskeletal, 'components,', whereas, there, was, consistent, 'down-regulation', of, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, triacylglycerol, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', cholesterol, ester, transfer, protein, 'RNA', was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([rapidly, in, monkey, adipose, 'tissue,', whereas, its, inhibitor, apolipoprotein, 'CI', was, repressed])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([insight, into, the, androgenic, regulation, of, lipoprotein, homeostasis, and, suggest, that, changes, in, adipose, lipoprotein, metabolism, could, contribute, to, 'HDL', cholesterol, reduction])].
[sujeto(['In', humans, and, 'mice,', low, plasma, levels, of, 'PON1']), verbo([have]), complemento([also, been, linked, to, the, development, of, atherosclerosis])].
[sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, hepatic, 'Pon1', expression, was, decreased, when, 'C57BL/6J', mice, were, fed, a, 'high-fat,', 'high-cholesterol', diet, supplemented, with, cholic, acid, '(', 'CA)'])].
[sujeto(['PON1', mRNA, levels, were, also]), verbo([repressed]), complemento([when, 'HepG2', 'cells,', derived, from, a, human, 'hepatoma,', were, incubated, with, natural, or, highly, specific, synthetic, 'FXR', agonists])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', fibroblast, growth, 'factor-19', '(', 'FGF-19)', mRNA, levels, were, greatly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, these, same, 'FXR', agonists])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', treatment, of, 'HepG2', cells, with, recombinant, human, 'FGF-19', significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['PON1', mRNA, levels])].
[sujeto(['These', data, demonstrate, that, human, 'PON1', expression, is]), verbo([repressed]), complemento([by, bile, acids, through, the, actions, of, 'FXR', and, 'FGF-19'])].
[sujeto(['As', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([by, 'us,', mice, with, targeted, disruption, of, the, 'CYP8B1', gene, '(', 'CYP8B1-/-)', fail, to, produce, cholic, acid, '(', 'CA),', upregulate, their, bile, acid, 'synthesis,', reduce, the, absorption, of, dietary, cholesterol, 'and,', after, cholesterol, 'feeding,', accumulate, less, liver, cholesterol, than, 'wild-type', '(', 'CYP8B1+/+)', mice])].
[sujeto(['Cholesterol-fed', 'CYP8B1-/-', mice, also, showed, a, significant, rise, in, 'HDL', cholesterol, and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([levels, of, liver, 'ABCA1', mRNA])].
[sujeto(['A', combined, 'CA', '(', 0.25, '%', ')', /, cholesterol, '(', 0.5, '%', ')', diet]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([absorption, of, intestinal, cholesterol, in, both, groups, of, 'mice,', increased, their, liver, cholesterol, 'content,', and, reduced, their, expression, of, 'CYP7A1', mRNA])].
[sujeto(['The', 'ABCG5/G8', liver, mRNA, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, both, groups, of, 'mice,', but, cholesterol, crystals, were, only, observed, in, bile, from, the, 'CYP8B1+/+', mice])].
[sujeto(['The', results, demonstrate, the, 'cholesterol-sparing', effects, of, 'CA:']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([absorption, and, reduced, conversion, into, bile, acids])].
[sujeto(['Interaction', between, 'FXR-', and, 'LXR-mediated', stimuli, might, also]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([expression, of, liver, 'ABCG5/G8'])].
[sujeto(['The', gene, encoding, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', is, tightly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([in, order, to, control, intrahepatic, cholesterol, and, bile, acid, levels])].
[sujeto(['Ligands', of, the, 'xenobiotic-sensing', pregnane, 'X', receptor]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['CYP7A1', expression])].
[sujeto(['To', retrace, the, evolution, of, the, molecular, mechanisms, underlying, 'CYP7A1', 'inhibition,', we, used, a, chicken, hepatoma, cell, system, that]), verbo([retains]), complemento([the, ability, to, be, induced, by, phenobarbital, and, other, drugs])].
[sujeto(['Whereas', bile, acids]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['CYP7A1', via, small, heterodimer, partner, and, liver, receptor, 'homolog-1,', mRNA, expression, of, these, nuclear, receptors, is, unchanged, by, xenobiotics])].
[sujeto(['Instead,', drugs]), verbo([repress]), complemento([chicken, hepatic, nuclear, factor, 4, alpha, '(', 'HNF4alpha)', transcript, levels, concomitant, with, a, reduction, in, 'CYP7A1', expression])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', no, reduction, of, 'HNF4alpha', levels, is]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, mouse, liver, in, vivo, and, in, human, primary, hepatocyte, 'cultures,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, 'anti-inflammatory', effect, of, 'interleukin-1', '(', 'IL-1)', receptor, antagonist, '(', 'IL-1Ra)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, 'described,', the, contribution, of, this, cytokine, to, cholesterol, metabolism, remains, unclear])].
[sujeto(['Real-time', 'PCR', analysis, revealed, that, 'IL-1Ra(-/-)', mice, failed, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([mRNA, expression, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase,', which, is, the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, in, bile, acid, 'synthesis,', with, concurrent, 'up-regulation', of, small, heterodimer, partner, 1, mRNA, expression])].
[sujeto(['Indeed,', 'IL-1Ra(-/-)', mice, showed, markedly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([bile, acid, 'excretion,', which, is, elevated, in, 'WT', mice, to, maintain, cholesterol, level, under, atherogenic, diet, feeding])].
[sujeto(['Previous', studies, show, that, feedback, inhibition, of, bile, acid, production, by, bile, acids, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, multiple, 'mechanisms,', including, activation, of, pregnane, 'X', receptor, '(', 'PXR)'])].
[sujeto(['To', delineate, the, mechanisms, underlying, 'PXR-mediated', suppression, of, bile, acid, 'biosynthesis,', we, examined, the, functional, 'cross-talk', between, human, 'PXR', and, 'HNF-4,', a, key, hepatic, activator, of, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, bile, acid, biosynthesis, including, the, cholesterol, 7, -, alpha, hydroxylase, '(', 'CYP7A1)', and, sterol, 12, -, alpha, hydroxylase, '(', 'CYP8B1)', genes])].
[sujeto(['The', coactivator, 'PGC-1']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([transcriptional, activity, of, 'HNF-4,', and, this, enhancement, was, suppressed, by, 'rifampicin-activated', 'PXR'])].
[sujeto(['Endogenous', 'PGC-1', from, mouse, liver, extracts]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, 'PXR,', and, recombinant, 'PGC-1', directly, interacted, with, both, 'PXR', and, 'HNF-4', in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['Rifampicin-dependent', interaction, of, 'PXR', with, 'PGC-1', was, shown, in, cells, by, 'coimmunoprecipitation,', and, intranuclear, localization, studies, using, confocal, microscopy]), verbo([provided]), complemento([further, evidence, for, this, interaction])].
[sujeto(['In', chromatin, immunoprecipitation, 'studies,', rifampicin, treatment, did, not]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['HNF-4', binding, to, the, native, promoters, of, 'CYP7A1', and, 'CYP8B1', but, resulted, in, dissociation, of, 'PGC-1', and, concomitant, gene, repression])].
[sujeto(['Our', study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'ligand-activated', 'PXR', interferes, with, 'HNF-4', signaling, by, targeting, the, common, coactivator, 'PGC-1,', which, underlies, physiologically, relevant, inhibitory, 'cross-talk', between, drug, metabolism, and, 'cholesterol/glucose', metabolism])].
[sujeto(['The', orphan, receptor, 'SHP']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, many, nuclear, receptors, and, inhibits, their, transcriptional, activities])].
[sujeto(['SHP', is, central, to, feedback, repression, of, cholesterol, 7, alpha, hydroxylase, gene, '(', 'CYP7A1)', expression, by, bile, 'acids,', which, is, critical, for]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([cholesterol, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['Chromatin', immunoprecipitation, studies, showed, that, mSin3A, and, a, 'Swi/Snf', complex, containing, 'Brm', as, a, central, 'ATPase', were]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([to, the, promoter])].
[sujeto(['This', recruitment, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, chromatin, remodeling, after, bile, acid, treatment, that, was, blunted, by, inhibition, of, the, endogenous, 'Swi/Snf', function, by, 'dominant-negative', 'ATPase', mutants])].
[sujeto(['Biochemical', studies, indicated, that, 'SHP', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, 'mSin3A-Swi/Snf', complex, by, direct, interaction, with, 'Brm', and, mSin3A, through, its, repression, domain])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, 'Brm,', but, not, an, 'ATPase', 'mutant,']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['CYP7A1', promoter, activity, and, further, enhanced, 'SHP-mediated', repression])].
[sujeto(['Bile', 'acid-induced', recruitment, of, 'mSin3A/Brm,', chromatin, 'remodeling,', and, concomitant, repression, of, endogenous, 'CYP7A1', expression, were, impaired, when, 'SHP', expression, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'SHP', small, interfering, 'RNA'])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'SHP', mediates, recruitment, of, 'mSin3A-Swi/Snf', to, the, 'CYP7A1', 'promoter,', resulting, in, chromatin, remodeling, and, gene, 'repression,', which, may, also, be, a, mechanism, for, the, repression, by, 'SHP', of, genes, activated, by, many, nuclear, receptors])].
[sujeto(['Cholesterol', excretion, by, 'ATP']), verbo([binding]), complemento([cassette, transporters, 'G5', and, 'G8', '(', 'ABCG5/G8)', and, bile, acid, biosynthesis, by, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', are, major, pathways, for, the, removal, of, cholesterol, into, bile])].
[sujeto(['The', 'ABCG8', 'H19', allele, was, significantly]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, a, greater, 'LDL', cholesterol, reduction, relative, to, the, wild, type, 'D19', allele, '(', 39.6, '%', versus, 36.6, '%', ',', 'P', =, 0.043, ')'])].
[sujeto(['This', difference, was]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([in, 'non-carriers', of, the, 'CYP7A1', promoter, polymorphism, '(', 42.7, '%', versus, 38.2, '%', ',', 'P', =, 0.048, ')', ',', and, was, diminished, in, accordance, with, the, number, of, 'CYP7A1', variant, alleles, '(', 1.8, '%', in, heterozygotes, and, 0.2, '%', in, 'homozygotes)'])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, the, 'ABCG8', 'H19', and, 'CYP7A1', 'C-204', alleles, appear, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner, on, atorvastatin, response])].
[sujeto(['β-Glucan,', a, soluble, fiber, with, viscous, 'property,']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, documented, 'cholesterol-lowering', effect])].
[sujeto(['Our', second, aim, was, to, determine, whether, any, 'gene-diet', interactions, are]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, 'cholesterol-lowering', efficacy, of, 'β-glucan'])].
[sujeto(['This', effect, of, 'HMW', 'β-glucan', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'gene-diet', 'interaction,', whereby, individuals, with, the, single, nucleotide, polymorphism, '(', 'SNP)', 'rs3808607-G', allele, '(', 'GG', or, 'GT)', of, the, cytochrome, 'P450', family, 7, subfamily, 'A', member, 1, gene, '(', 'CYP7A1)', had, greater, responses, to, 3, g, 'HMW', 'β-glucan/d', in, lowering, 'TC', than, 'TT', carriers, '(', 'P=', 0.0006, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Despite', that, quercetin, is, implicated, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([cholesterol, 'metabolism,', the, molecular, mechanism, is, poorly, understood])].
[sujeto(['We', hypothesized, that, quercetin]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([cholesterol, homeostasis, through, regulating, the, key, enzymes, involved, in, hepatic, cholesterol, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['To', test, this, 'hypothesis,', we, compared, the, profile, of, key, enzymes, and, transcription, factors]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, hepatic, cholesterol, metabolism, in, rats, with, or, without, quercetin, supplementation])].
[sujeto(['The', expression, of, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase,', as, well, as, liver, 'X', receptor, 'α,', an, important, transcription, 'factor,', was, also]), verbo([increased]), complemento([at, both, mRNA, and, protein, levels, by, quercetin])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, quercetin, treatment, significantly, increased, 'ATP', binding, cassette, transporter, 'G1', mRNA, and, protein, expression, in, the, 'liver,', suggesting, that, quercetin, may, increase, hepatic, cholesterol, efflux])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', the, results, presented, here, indicate, that, quercetin]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([hepatic, cholesterol, metabolism, mainly, through, the, pathways, that, promote, 'cholesterol-to-bile', acid, conversion, and, cholesterol, efflux])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, utilized, male, mice, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([levels, of, 27, 'OH', either, due, to, increased, production, '(', 'CYP27A1', transgenic, 'mice)', or, reduced, metabolism, '(', 'Cyp7b1-/-', 'mice)'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, liver, of, 'CYP27tg', mice, we]), verbo([found]), complemento([a, modest, increase, of, the, mRNA, levels, corresponding, to, the, 'LXR', target, genes, 'Cyp7b1', and, 'Abca1'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, liver, of, the, 'Cyp27-/-', mice, treated, with, 0.025, '%', cholic, acid, there, was, no, significant, effect, of, the, knockout, on, the, 'LXR']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes])].
[sujeto(['In', a, previous, work, 'triple-knockout', mice, deficient, in, the, biosynthesis, of, 24, 'S-hydroxycholesterol,', 25, -, hydroxycholesterol, and, 27, 'OH', were, shown, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([impaired, response, to, dietary, 'cholesterol,', suggesting, 'side-chain', oxidized, oxysterols, to, be, mediators, in, 'cholesterol-induced', effects, on, 'LXR', target, genes, at, a, transcriptional, level, '(', 'Chen', 'W'])].
[sujeto(['We', show, here, that, treatment, of, wildtype, mice, with, dietary, cholesterol, under, the, same, conditions, as, in, the, above, study]), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, 'LXR', target, genes, 'Lpl,', 'Abcg8', and, 'Srebp1c', in, wild, type, mice, but, failed, to, activate, the, same, genes, in, mice, lacking, 27, -, hydroxycholesterol, due, to, a, knockout, of, 'Cyp27'])].
[sujeto(['The', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 27, 'OH', is, not, an, important, regulator, of, 'Srebp-', or, 'LXR', regulated, genes, under, basal, conditions, in, mouse, liver])].
[sujeto(['On', the, other, hand, 27, 'OH', appears, to]), verbo([mediate]), complemento(['cholesterol-induced', effects, on, some, 'LXR', target, genes, at, a, transcriptional, level, under, some, in, vivo, conditions])].
[sujeto(['Hypoxic', stress, changes, the, transcription, of, several, genes, by]), verbo([activating]), complemento([a, heterodimeric, transcription, factor, called, 'hypoxia-inducible', 'factor-', 1, 'α/β', '(', 'HIF-1α/β)'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, hypoxic, stress, '(', 0.1, '%', 'O2)', decreased, the, expression, of, cytochrome, 'P450', 7, 'A1', '(', 'CYP7A1),', a, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, involved, in, bile, acid, biosynthesis])].
[sujeto(['Chenodeoxycholic', acid, '(', 'CDCA),', a, major, component, of, bile, 'acids,']), verbo([represses]), complemento(['CYP7A1', by, activating, a, transcriptional, repressor, named, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)'])].
[sujeto(['We', observed, that, hypoxia]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, levels, of, both, 'CDCA', and, 'SHP,', suggesting, that, hypoxia, repressed, 'CYP7A1', without, inducing, 'SHP'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([finding]), complemento([that, overexpression, of, 'HIF-1α', increased, the, activity, of, the, 'CYP7A1', promoter, suggested, that, hypoxia, decreased, the, expression, of, 'CYP7A1', in, a, 'HIF-1-independent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', the, results, of, this, study]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, hypoxia, decreased, the, activity, of, 'CYP7A1', by, limiting, its, substrate, 'O2,', and, by, decreasing, the, transcription, of, 'CYP7A1'])].
[sujeto(['Bile', acids, are, primarily]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([from, cholesterol, in, the, liver, and, have, important, roles, in, dietary, lipid, absorption, and, cholesterol, homoeostasis])].
[sujeto(['Detailed', roles, of, the, orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, regulating, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1),', the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, in, bile, acid, 'synthesis,', have, not, yet, been, fully, elucidated])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'oestrogen-related', receptor, γ, '(', 'ERRγ)', is, a, novel, transcriptional, regulator, of, 'CYP7A1', expression])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, cannabinoid, receptor, type, 1, '(', 'CB1', 'receptor)', signalling]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['ERRγ-mediated', transcription, of, the, 'CYP7A1', gene])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'ERRγ']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['CYP7A1', expression, in, vitro, and, in, 'vivo,', whereas, knockdown, of, 'ERRγ', attenuated, 'CYP7A1', expression])].
[sujeto(['Small', heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, transcriptional, activity, of, 'ERRγ', and, thus, regulated, 'CYP7A1', expression])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'ERRγ']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, increased, bile, acid, 'levels,', whereas, an, inverse, agonist, of, 'ERRγ,', 'GSK5182,', reduced, 'CYP7A1', expression, and, bile, acid, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, molecular, mechanism, linking, 'ERRγ', and, bile, acid, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, observed, that, knockout, of, 'Niemann-Pick', 'C1-Like', 1, '(', 'NPC1L1),', a, cholesterol, transporter, essential, for, intestinal, cholesterol, 'absorption,', reduces, the, output, of, dry, stool, in, mice])].
[sujeto(['Germ-free', '(', 'GF)', mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([reduced, stool, output])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we, show, that, 'GF', versus, 'SPF', mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([reduced, intestinal, absorption, and, increased, fecal, excretion, of, 'cholesterol,', particularly, after, treatment, with, ezetimibe])].
[sujeto(['This', negative, balance, of, cholesterol, in, 'GF', mice, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, reduced, plasma, and, hepatic, 'cholesterol,', and, likely, caused, by, reduced, expression, of, 'NPC1L1', and, increased, expression, of, 'ABCG5', and, 'ABCG8', in, small, intestine])].
[sujeto(['Expression', levels, of, other, genes, in, intestine, and, liver, largely, reflect, a, state, of, cholesterol, depletion, and, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, intestinal, sensing, of, bile, acids])].
[sujeto(['Altogether,', our, findings]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, broad, role, of, microbiota, in, regulating, 'whole-body', cholesterol, homeostasis, and, its, response, to, a, 'cholesterol-lowering', 'drug,', ezetimibe])].
[sujeto(['Kaempferol', is, a, dietary, flavonol, previously, shown, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([cellular, lipid, and, glucose, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['However,', its, molecular, mechanisms, of, action, and]), verbo([target]), complemento([proteins, have, remained, 'elusive,', probably, due, to, the, involvement, of, multiple, proteins])].
[sujeto(['This', study, investigated, the, molecular]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, kaempferol])].
[sujeto(['Ligand']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, kaempferol, to, liver, 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXRs)', was, quantified, by, 'time-resolved', fluorescence, resonance, energy, transfer, and, surface, plasmon, resonance, analyses])].
[sujeto(['Kaempferol', directly]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, and, induces, the, transactivation, of, 'LXRs,', with, stronger, specificity, for, the, 'β-subtype', '(', 'EC50', =, 0.33, 'μM)'])].
[sujeto(['The', oral, administration, of, kaempferol, in, 'apolipoprotein-E-deficient', mice, '(', 150, 'mg/day/kg', body, 'weight)', significantly, reduced, plasma, glucose, and]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['high-density', lipoprotein, cholesterol, levels, and, insulin, sensitivity, compared, with, the, 'vehicle-fed', control])].
[sujeto(['Kaempferol', also, reduced, plasma, triglyceride, concentrations, and, did, not]), verbo([cause]), complemento([liver, 'steatosis,', a, common, side, effect, of, potent, 'LXR', activation])].
[sujeto(['In', immunoblotting, 'analysis,', kaempferol, reduced, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([accumulation, of, sterol, regulatory, 'element-binding', 'protein-1', '(', 'SREBP-1)'])].
[sujeto(['They', also]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, kaempferol, activates, 'LXR-β', and, suppresses, 'SREBP-1', to, enhance, symptoms, in, metabolic, syndrome])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, disturbed, hepatic, clock, gene, expression, in, 'MLL4', mutant, 'mice,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, rhythmic, fluctuation, of, hepatic, and, serum, bile, acid, '(', 'BA)', levels, over, the, circadian, cycle, is, abolished, in, 'MLL4', mutant, mice])].
[sujeto(['Together,', our, results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([strong, in, vivo, support, for, important, roles, of, both, 'MLL3', and, 'MLL4', in, similar, metabolic, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'MLL3', and, 'MLL4', complexes]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, major, epigenetic, regulators, of, diverse, metabolic, processes, '(', including, circadian, control, of, bile, acid, 'homeostasis)', and, as, critical, transcriptional, coactivators, of, the, circadian, 'TFs,', 'RORs'])].
[sujeto(['Atorvastatin']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['BA', pool, 'size,', mainly, due, to, less, 'BA', in, the, intestine])].
[sujeto(['Atorvastatin']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, ratio, of, 12, 'α-OH/non12α-OH', 'BAs'])].
[sujeto(['Atorvastatin']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, mRNAs, of, the, 'BA-synthetic', enzymes, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase', '(', 'Cyp7a1)', '(', over, 10, -, 'fold)', and, cytochrome, 'P450', 27, 'a1,', the, 'BA', uptake, transporters, 'Na⁺/taurocholate', cotransporting, polypeptide, and, organic, anion, transporting, polypeptide, 1, 'b2,', and, the, efflux, transporter, multidrug, 'resistance-associated', protein, 2, in, the, liver])].
[sujeto(['Noticeably,', atorvastatin]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'BA', nuclear, receptor, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', target, 'genes,', namely, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'liver)', and, fibroblast, growth, factor, 15, '(', 'ileum)'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', atorvastatin]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, mRNAs, of, the, organic, cation, uptake, transporter, 1, and, cholesterol, efflux, transporters, 'Abcg5', and, 'Abcg8', in, the, liver])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'BA-synthetic', enzymes, and, 'BA', transporters, appear, to, be, a, compensatory, response, to, maintain, 'BA', homeostasis, after, atorvastatin, treatment])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Cyp7a1', induction, by, atorvastatin, appears, to, be, due, to]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['FXR', signaling, in, both, the, liver, and, intestine])].
[sujeto(['Bile', salts]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([their, own, production, by, inducing, the, nuclear, receptor, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', '(', encoded, by, 'NR0B2),', which, contributes, to, repression, of, the, gene, encoding, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1),', a, key, enzyme, for, the, control, of, bile, salt, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', bile, salts]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([hepatic, synthesis, of, nitric, oxide])].
[sujeto(['We', investigated, the, role, of, nitric, oxide, signaling, in, 'the\240\control', of, 'CYP7A1', expression, and, the, involvement, in, 'this\240\process', of, 'glyceraldehyde-3-phosphate', dehydrogenase, '(', 'GAPDH),', which]), verbo([participates]), complemento([in, intracellular, propagation, of, nitric, oxide, signals])].
[sujeto(['Rats', placed, on, 'cholate-rich', diets, and, given, 'L-NAME', had]), verbo([increased]), complemento([intrahepatic, and, biliary, levels, of, bile, 'salts,', and, deficiency, in, repression, of, 'CYP7A1', '(', at, the, messenger, 'RNA', and, protein, 'levels)', in, liver, 'tissue,', despite, preserved, induction, of, 'SHP'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'hepatocytes,', cholate]), verbo([promoted]), complemento(['S-nitrosylation', of, 'GAPDH', and, its, translocation, to, the, 'nucleus,', accompanied, by, 'S-nitrosylation', of, histone, deacetylase, 2, '\240\(HDAC2)', and, 'Sirtuin', 1, '(', 'SIRT1),', deacetylases, that, 'participate,', 'respectively,', in, the, formation, of, 'Cyp7a1', and, 'Shp', repressor, complexes])].
[sujeto(['Knockdown', of, 'GAPDH']), verbo([prevented]), complemento([repression, of, 'CYP7A1', by, 'cholate,', and, blocking, nuclear, transport, of, nitrosylated, 'GAPDH', reduced, 'cholate-induced', nitrosylation, of, 'HDAC2', and, 'SIRT1;', this, effect, was, accompanied, by, abrogation, of, 'Cyp7a1', repression])].
[sujeto(['Cholate']), verbo([induced]), complemento([binding, of, 'SHP', to, 'HDAC2', and, its, recruitment, to, the, 'Cyp7a1', 'promoter;', these, processes, were, inhibited, by, blocking, nitric, oxide, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['Levels', of, nitrosylated, 'GAPDH', and, nitrosylated, 'HDAC2', were]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, cholestatic, human, and, rat, livers, reflecting, increased, concentrations, of, bile, salts, in, these, conditions])].
[sujeto(['In', rat, 'liver,', excess, levels, of, bile, salts]), verbo([activate]), complemento([a, 'GAPDH-mediated', transnitrosylation, cascade, that, provides, feedback, inhibition, of, bile, salt, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['Intestinal', 'L-cells', secrete, 'glucagon-like', 'peptide-1', '(', 'GLP-1)', and, can, be]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, bile, acids, '(', 'BA)', influencing, insulin, resistance, and, hepatic, steatosis, development, and, progression])].
[sujeto(['Administration', of, both, 'CA', and, 'UDCA', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([to, decreased, hepatic, triglyceride, content, and, complete, reversion, of, histological, steatosis])].
[sujeto(['Statins', are]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([to, preserve, gallbladder, function, by, suppressing, 'pro-inflammatory', cytokines, and, preventing, cholesterol, accumulation, in, gallbladder, epithelial, cells])].
[sujeto(['They', also, affect, 'cross-talk', among, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, receptors, that, regulate, 'cholesterol-bile', acid, metabolism, in, the, nuclei, of, hepatocytes])].
[sujeto(['However,', there, is, controversy, over, whether, or, how, statins, change, the, expression, of, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, '(', 'PPAR)alpha,', 'PPARgamma,', liver, 'X', receptor, alpha, '(', 'LXRalpha),', farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR),', 'ABCG5,', 'ABCG8,', and, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', which, are, directly]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, cholesterol, saturation, index, in, bile])].
[sujeto(['In', cultured, 'Hep3B', 'cells,', pravastatin]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['PPARalpha', and, 'PPARgamma', protein, 'expression,', induced, stronger, expression, of, 'PPARgamma', than, that, of, 'PPARalpha,', increased, 'LXRalpha', mRNA, 'expression,', activated, 'ABCG5', and, 'ABCG8', mRNA, expression, mediated, by, 'FXR', as, well, as, 'LXRalpha,', enhanced, 'FXR', mRNA, 'expression,', and, increased, 'CYP7A1', mRNA, expression, mediated, by, the, 'PPARgamma', and, 'LXRalpha', 'pathways,', together, or, independently])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, pravastatin, prevents, cholesterol, gallstone, diseases, via, the, increase, of, 'FXR,', 'LXRalpha', and, 'CYP7A1', in, human, hepatocytes])].
[sujeto(['In', mice, fed, normal, diets, and, given, injections, of, 1, ',', 25, '(', 'OH)2D3,', liver, and, plasma, concentrations, of, 1, ',', 25, '(', 'OH)2D3']), verbo([increased]), complemento([and, decreased, in, unison])].
[sujeto(['Changes', in, hepatic, 'Cyp7a1', messenger, 'RNA', '(', 'mRNA)', correlated, with, those, of, 'Cyp24a1', '(', 'a\240\Vdr']), verbo([target]), complemento(['gene)', and, inversely, with, 'Shp', 'mRNA,', but, not, 'ileal\240\Fgf15', mRNA])].
[sujeto(['Similarly,', incubation, with, 1, ',', 25, '(', 'OH)2D3']), verbo([increased]), complemento([levels, of, 'Cyp24a1/CYP24A1', and, 'Cyp7a1/CYP7A1', mRNA, in, mouse, and, human, 'hepatocytes,', and, reduced, levels, of, 'Shp', mRNA, in, mouse, hepatocytes])].
[sujeto(['In', 'Fxr(-/-)', and, 'wild-type', mice, with, 'hypercholesterolemia,', injection, of, 1, ',', 25, '(', 'OH)2D3', consistently, reduced, levels, of, plasma, and, liver, cholesterol, and, 'Shp', 'mRNA,', and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([hepatic, 'Cyp7a1', mRNA, and, 'protein;', these, changes, were, not, observed, in, 'Shp(-/-)', mice, given, 1, ',', 25, '(', 'OH)2D3', and, fed, 'Western', diets])].
[sujeto(['Truncation', of, the, human, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', promoter, and, deletion, analyses, revealed, 'VDR-dependent', inhibition, of, 'SHP,', and, mobility, shift, assays, showed, direct]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'VDR', to, enhancer, regions, of, 'SHP'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', chromatin, immunoprecipitation, analysis, of, livers, from, mice, showed, that, injection, of, 1, ',', 25, '(', 'OH)2D3']), verbo([increased]), complemento([recruitment, of, 'Vdr', and, rodent, retinoid, 'X', receptor, to, the, 'Shp', promoter])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, the, 'VDR']), verbo([represses]), complemento([hepatic, 'SHP', to, increase, levels, of, mouse, and, human, 'CYP7A1', and, reduce, cholesterol])].
[sujeto([')', significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, plasma, levels, of, 'non-high-density', lipoprotein, '(', 'non-HDL)', cholesterol, and, apolipoprotein, 'B', in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['It', also]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, mRNA, levels, of, hepatic, small, heterodimer, 'partner-1,', induced, the, mRNA, expression, of, hepatic, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase,', reduced, hepatic, cholesterol, and, triglyceride, 'levels,', increased, fecal, bile, acid, 'excretion,', and, upregulated, the, expression, of, hepatic, 'low-density', lipoprotein, '(', 'LDL)', receptor])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'compound-T3', significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([plasma, 'HDL', cholesterol, and, apolipoprotein, 'A-I', levels])].
[sujeto(['The', mRNA, expression, levels, of, hepatic, apolipoprotein, 'A-I', tended, to]), verbo([increase]), complemento([after, 'compound-T3', treatment])].
[sujeto(['Compound-T3', also]), verbo([induced]), complemento([accumulation, of, hepatic, bile, acids, and, decreased, the, mRNA, expression, levels, of, the, hepatic, bile, acid, export, pump])].
[sujeto([')', on, the, plasma, and, hepatic, lipid, parameters, were, similar, to, those, of, 'compound-T3,', and, it]), verbo([increased]), complemento([fecal, bile, acid, levels, without, causing, accumulation, of, hepatic, bile, acids])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'LDL', 'receptor-mediated', hepatic, 'LDL', incorporation, due, to, cholesterol, catabolism, catalyzed, by, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase', decreases, plasma, 'non-HDL', cholesterol, levels])].
[sujeto(['Upregulation', of, hepatic, apolipoprotein, 'A-I', mRNA, expression, may, partially, contribute, to, the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'HDL', cholesterol, levels, mediated, by, 'compound-T3'])].
[sujeto(['Inflammation', is, a, major, contributor, to, the, development, of, atherosclerotic, 'plaque,', yet, the, involvement, of, liver, and, visceral, adipose, tissue, inflammatory, status, in, atherosclerotic, lesion, development]), verbo([has]), complemento([yet, to, be, fully, elucidated])].
[sujeto(['We', hypothesized, that, an, atherogenic, diet, would]), verbo([increase]), complemento([inflammatory, response, and, lipid, accumulation, in, the, liver, and, gonadal, adipose, tissue, '(', 'GAT)', and, would, correlate, with, systemic, inflammation, and, aortic, lesion, formation, in, 'low-density', lipoprotein, '(', 'LDL)', receptor, null, '(', 'LDLr-/-)', mice])].
[sujeto(['Compared', with, the, control, 'diet,', the, atherogenic, diet, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([hepatic, triglyceride, and, total, cholesterol, '(', 'TC),', primarily, esterified, 'cholesterol,', and, 'GAT', triglyceride, content])].
[sujeto(['These', changes, were, accompanied, by]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'acyl-CoA', synthetase, 'long-chain', family, member, 5, ',', 'CD36,', 'ATP-binding', 'cassette,', subfamily, 'A,', member, 1, and, scavenger, receptor, 'B', class, 1, ',', and, they, decreased, the, expression, of, cytochrome, 'P450,', family, 7, and, subfamily, 'a,', polypeptide, 1, in, 'GAT'])].
[sujeto(['Aortic', 'TC', content, was, positively]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, hepatic, 'TC,', 'triglyceride,', and, 'GAT', triglyceride, contents, as, well, as, plasma, interleukin, 6, and, monocyte, chemoattractant, 'protein-1', concentrations])].
[sujeto(['Although', when, compared, with, the, control, 'diet,', the, atherogenic, diet]), verbo([increased]), complemento([hepatic, tumor, necrosis, factor, α, 'production,', they, were, not, associated, with, aortic, 'TC', content])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'LDLr-/-', mice, responded, to, the, atherogenic, diet, by, increasing, lipid, accumulation, in, the, liver, and, 'GAT,', which, may, have, increased, inflammatory, response])].
[sujeto(['Aortic', 'TC', content, was, positively]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, systemic, inflammation, but, not, hepatic, and, 'GAT', inflammatory, status])].
[sujeto(['Small', heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'bile,', 'lipid,', and, glucose, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['Loss', of, 'SHP', in, 'ApoE-/-', mice]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, size, of, adipocytes, in, white, adipose, tissue, and, reduced, lipid, accumulation, in, the, liver])].
[sujeto(['There', was, no, statistical, difference, in, 'non-high', density, lipoprotein, cholesterol, levels, between, 'ApoE-/-SHP-/-', mice, and, 'ApoE-/-', mice, despite, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([of, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase', expression, in, the, liver])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'SHP', function, can, prevent, 'atherosclerosis,', and, resistance, to, 'diet-induced', obesity, is, the, primary, factor, contributing, to, this, protective, effect])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, fact, that, 15, 'd-PGJ2', exerts, also, 'PPARγ-independent', biological, actions]), verbo([has]), complemento([highly, addressed, its, 'multi-target', behavior])].
[sujeto(['Assay', of, 15, 'd-PGJ2', regulation, on, hFXRα]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, revealed, that, treatment, of, 'HepG2', cells, with, 15, 'd-PGJ2', resulted, in, the, stimulation, of, mRNA, expressions, of, 'bile-salt', export, pump, '(', 'BSEP),', and, the, decrease, of, cholesterol, 7, 'a-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7a1)'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', functional, assays, indicated, that, 15, 'd-PGJ2']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([the, conversion, of, cholesterol, to, bile, acids, in, 'HepG2', cells])].

[sujeto(['Given', that, hFXRα, functions, potently, in, the, regulation, of, hepatic, bile, acid, metabolism, and, 'lipid/glucose', 'homeostasis,', our, current, work, is, expected, to, help, better, understand, the, 'multi-target', features, of, this, 'PGD2', metabolite, in, biological, 'pathways,', and, 15, 'd-PGJ2', as, a, new, discovered, 'FXR', antagonist, might]), verbo([find]), complemento([its, potential, application, in, further, 'anti-hypercholesterol', research])].
[sujeto(['Meyer', '(', 'RGE)]']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, have, various, actions, on, physiological, functions])].

[sujeto([5, ')', ',', whereas, fatty, acid]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 1, '(', 'FABP1)', and, cytochrome, 'P450', family, 7, subfamily, 'A', member, 1, '(', 'CYP7A1)', were, upregulated, '(', 'P&lt;0'])].

[sujeto(['Notably,', the, expression, of, genes]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, cholesterol, synthesis, '(', sterol, regulatory, 'element‑binding', 'protein‑2', and, 3, '‑hydroxy‑3‑methylglutaryl‑CoA', 'reductase),', cholesterol, secretion, '[', 'ATP‑binding', cassette, 'subfamily\240\G', 'member\240\5', '(', 'ABCG5)', and, 'ABCG8]', and, bile, acid, synthesis, '[', cytochrome, 'P450', family, 7, subfamily, 'A', member, 1, '(', 'Cyp7a1),', 'Cyp7b1,', 'Cyp27a1', and, 'Cyp8b1]', was, reduced, in, the, livers, of, mice, injected, with, 'BT', or, 'CF'])].
[sujeto(['The', present, study, therefore, measured, the, expression, levels, of, transcription, factors, that, are, known, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['Cyp7a1', 'expression,', namely, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR),', 'pregnane\240\X', 'receptor\240\(PXR)', and, small, heterodimer, 'partner\240\(SHP)'])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'FXR,', 'PXR', 'and\240\SHP', expression, was, predicted, to]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, presence, of, proteasome, 'inhibitors,', the, expression, levels, were, actually, 'reduced;', 'thus,', it, was, concluded, that, they, were, not, involved, in, the, proteasome, 'inhibition‑induced', regulation, of, 'Cyp7a1'])].

[sujeto(['In\240\conclusion,', these, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, proteasome, inhibition, regulates, cholesterol, and, biliary, metabolism, via, the, 'JNK', and, 'PKA', 'pathways,', and, is, a, promising, therapeutic, strategy, to, prevent, gallstone, disease])].

[sujeto(['In', a, large, cohort, of, patients, with, autoimmune, diseases, we]), verbo([found]), complemento([an, association, between, 'anti-Ro/SSA', and, 'anti-La/SSB', antibodies, and, 6, autoimmune, 'diseases,', amongst, which, primary, 'APS', and, 'PM'])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, support, the, concept, of, interplay, between, infectious, agents, and, 'autoimmunity,', such, as, the, plausibility, of, an, infectious, agent, that]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([the, immune, system, to, produce, specific, antibodies, which, will, later, result, in, a, unique, group, of, 'AID'])].
[sujeto(['Influenza', virus]), verbo([expresses]), complemento([transcripts, early, in, infection, and, transitions, towards, genome, replication, at, later, time, points])].
[sujeto(['This', process]), verbo([requires]), complemento([de, novo, assembly, of, the, viral, replication, 'machinery,', large, ribonucleoprotein, complexes, '(', 'RNPs)', composed, of, the, viral, 'polymerase,', genomic, 'RNA', and, oligomeric, nucleoprotein, '(', 'NP)'])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, that, human, protein, kinase, 'C', '(', 'PKC)', family, members]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['RNP', assembly])].
[sujeto(['Activated', 'PKCδ']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, the, polymerase, subunit, 'PB2', and, 'phospho-regulates', 'NP', oligomerization, and, 'RNP', assembly, during, infection])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, its, role, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['RNP', 'assembly,', knockout, of, 'PKCδ', impairs, virus, infection, by, selectively, disrupting, genome, replication])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', influenza, virus, exploits, host, 'PKCs', to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['RNP', 'assembly,', a, step, required, for, the, transition, from, primary, transcription, to, genome, replication, during, the, infectious, cycle])].

[sujeto(['Modifications', in, mRNA, constitute, ancient, mechanisms, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([gene, expression, 'post-transcriptionally'])].

[sujeto(['The', 'Guanine-rich', 'RNA', sequence]), verbo([binding]), complemento([factor, 1, '(', 'GRSF1)', is, a, member, of, the, heterogeneous, nuclear, ribonucleoprotein, 'F/H', family, and, has, been, implicated, in, 'RNA', 'processing,', 'RNA', transport, and, translational, regulation])].
[sujeto(['Amino', acid, alignments, and, homology, modeling]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([the, existence, of, three, distinct, 'RNA-binding', domains, and, two, auxiliary, domains])].

[sujeto(['Thus,', disturbing, cholesterol, trafficking, is, an, effective, approach, for]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([angiogenesis])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'SOD/SOD2', activities, are, modulated, by, cholesterol, levels])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'preventing/reducing', mitochondrial, oxidative, stress, may, represent, a, common, approach, against, neurodegenerative, diseases])].
[sujeto(['Niemann-Pick', type, 'C2', '(', 'NPC2)', is, a, lysosome, luminal, protein, that, functions, in, concert, with, 'NPC1', to]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([egress, of, 'low-density', 'lipoprotein-derived', cholesterol, from, lysosome])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, kappa, 'B', subunit, 2, '(', 'NF-κB2)', protein, is, a, component, of, 'NF-κB', transcription, factor, complex, critically, implicated, in, immune, and, inflammatory, responses])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'NF-κB2', regulates, intracellular, cholesterol, transport, by, controlling, 'NPC2', expression])].
[sujeto(['RNAi-mediated', disruption, of, 'NF-κB2,', as, well, as, other, signaling, members, of, the, 'non-canonical', 'NF-κB', 'pathway,']), verbo([caused]), complemento([intracellular, cholesterol, accumulation])].
[sujeto(['Blockage', of, the, 'non-canonical', 'NF-κB', pathway]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['NPC2', 'expression,', whereas, 'Lymphotoxin', β, receptor, '(', 'LTβR)', activation, or, 'Baff', receptor, '(', 'BaffR)', stimulation, 'up-regulated', the, mRNA, abundance, and, protein, level, of, 'NPC2'])].
[sujeto(['Further,', 'NF-κB2']), verbo([activated]), complemento(['NPC2', transcription, through, direct, binding, to, its, promoter, region])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', these, data, identify, a, regulatory, role, for, the, 'non-canonical', 'NF-κB', pathway, in, intracellular, cholesterol, trafficking, and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, link, between, cholesterol, transport, and, immune, system])].
[sujeto(['Niemann-Pick', disease, type, 'C', '(', 'NPC)', is, a, lysosomal, storage, disorder]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, in, either, 'NPC-1', or, 'NPC-2', 'genes,', resulting, in, abnormal, intracellular, cholesterol, trafficking])].
[sujeto(['Lung', involvement]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, described, in, only, few, patients, with, 'NPC,', mostly, 'NPC2'])].
[sujeto(['Seven', patients, were]), verbo([reported]), complemento([of, having, interstitial, disease, by, various, imaging, modalities])].
[sujeto(['It', can]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, respiratory, insufficiency, and, death, from, respiratory, failure])].
[sujeto(['What', is, 'Known:', '•', 'Lung', involvement]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, described, in, only, few, patients, with, 'NPC'])].
[sujeto(['•', 'Most']), verbo([reported]), complemento(['NPC', cases, with, pulmonary, involvement, were, of, 'NPC2'])].
[sujeto(['Cellular', lipids, determine, membrane, integrity, and, fluidity, and, are, being, increasingly]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([to, influence, immune, responses])].
[sujeto(['In', an, intricate, pathway]), verbo([involving]), complemento([the, lysosomal, cholesterol, transporter, 'NPC1,', the, sterol, gets, unequally, distributed, across, intracellular, compartments])].
[sujeto(['By', using, pharmacological, and, genetic, approaches]), verbo([targeting]), complemento(['NPC1,', we, reveal, that, blockade, of, cholesterol, trafficking, through, the, late, 'endosome-lysosome', pathway, blunts, 'NLRP3', inflammasome, activation])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, inability, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, 'NLRP3', inflammasome, was, traced, to, perturbed, cholesterol, trafficking, to, the, 'ER', but, not, the, 'PM'])].
[sujeto(['Together,', this, study]), verbo([reveals]), complemento(['ER', sterol, levels, as, a, metabolic, rheostat, for, the, activation, of, the, 'NLRP3', inflammasome])].
[sujeto(['Transport', begins, when, cholesterol]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, 'N-terminal', domain, '(', 'NTD)', of, 'NPC1,', which, projects, to, the, surface, of, the, glycocalyx])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, reconstitute, cholesterol, transport, by]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([the, 'NTD', as, a, fragment, separate, from, the, remaining, portion, of, 'NPC1'])].
[sujeto(['When', 'co-expressed,', the, two, 'NPC1', fragments, reconstitute, cholesterol, 'transport,', indicating, that, the, 'NTD']), verbo([has]), complemento([the, flexibility, to, interact, with, the, remaining, parts, of, 'NPC1', even, when, not, covalently, linked])].
[sujeto(['Niemann-Pick', disease, type, 'C', '(', 'NPC)', is, a, neurovisceral, disorder]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, accumulation, of, lipids, such, as, cholesterol, and, sphingolipids])].
[sujeto(['NPC', is]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, either, 'NPC1', or, 'NPC2,', which, encode, lysosomal, proteins, located, at, membraneous, and, soluble, 'fractions,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['For', the, past, 'decade,', the, oxidation, products, of, 'cholesterol,', such, as, 'cholestane-3β,5α,6β-triol', and, 7, -, 'ketocholesterol,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, considered, selective, biomarkers, for, 'NPC'])].
[sujeto(['However,', recent, evidence]), verbo([has]), complemento([indicated, numerous, novel, biomarkers, for, 'NPC,', which, raises, the, possibility, that, the, diagnosis, of, 'NPC', might, be, associated, with, the, elevation, of, multiple, lipid, 'biomarkers,', rather, than, a, single, biomarker])].
[sujeto(['Sphingosylphosphorylcholine', '(', 'SPC)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, suggested, to, be, one, such, biomarker, for, 'NPC,', in, which, elevated, sphingomyelin, is, a, potential, precursor])].
[sujeto(['We', further, extended, the, study, to, plasma, 'lysophingomyelin-509', for, 'NPC,', a, newly]), verbo([reported]), complemento([biomarker, with, uncharacterized, chemical, nature])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, efficacy, of, plasma, 'SPC', and, 'lysosphingomyelin-509', as, promising, biomarkers, for, this, disorder, was, supported, by, the]), verbo([finding]), complemento([that, the, urinary, concentration, of, 3, 'β-sulfooxy-7β-N-acetylglucosaminyl-5-cholen-24-oic', 'acid,', an, established, biomarker, for, 'NPC,', was, also, elevated, in, the, 'NPC-affected', individuals])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, novel, combination, of, plasma, 'biomarkers,', such, as, 'SPC', 'and/or', 'lysophingomyelin-509,', and, urinary, bile, acid, metabolite, could, offer, a, promising, platform, for, the, diagnosis, of, 'NPC'])].
[sujeto(['Niemann-Pick', 'C1', '(', 'NPC1),', a, host, receptor]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, envelope, glycoprotein, '(', 'GP)-mediated', entry, of, filoviruses, into, 'cells,', is, believed, to, be, a, major, determinant, of, cell, susceptibility, to, filovirus, infection])].
[sujeto(['It', is, known, that, proteolytically, digested, 'Ebola', virus, '(', 'EBOV)', 'GP']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 2, protruding, loops, in, domain, 'C', of, 'NPC1'])].
[sujeto(['To', investigate, whether, these, 'SNPs', affect, cell, susceptibility, to, filovirus, 'infection,', we, generated, 'Vero', 'E6', cell, lines, stably]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['NPC1', with, 'SNP', substitutions, and, compared, their, susceptibility, to, vesicular, stomatitis, virus, pseudotyped, with, filovirus, 'GPs', and, infectious, 'EBOV'])].

[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, human, 'NPC1', 'SNPs', may, likely, affect, host, susceptibility, to, filoviruses])].
[sujeto(['Whereas', deficient, 'HH', signalling]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, birth, 'defects,', unrestrained, 'HH', signalling, is, implicated, in, human, 'cancers2,4-6'])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, reported, an, enhanced, processing, of, 'β-amyloid', precursor, protein, '(', 'APP)', by, 'β-secretase', '(', 'BACE1),', a, key, enzyme, in, the, pathogenesis, of, 'AD,', in, 'NPC1-null', cells])].

[sujeto(['The', most, common, 'NPC1', mutation, is, a, missense, mutation, '(', 'NPC1I1061T)', that]), verbo([causes]), complemento([misfolding, and, rapid, degradation, of, mutant, protein, in, the, endoplasmic, reticulum])].

[sujeto(['We', sought, to, identify, novel, compounds, that]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([lysosomal, cholesterol, storage, in, 'NPC1I1061T/I1061T', patient, fibroblasts, using, a, 'high-content', screen, with, the, cholesterol, 'dye,', filipin, and, the, lysosomal, 'marker,', 'LAMP1'])].
[sujeto(['Twenty-three', hits, were, identified, that]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([both, filipin, and, 'LAMP1', signals])].
[sujeto(['Subsequent', analyses, showed, that, alexidine, specifically]), verbo([increased]), complemento([levels, of, 'NPC1', transcript, and, mature, protein, in, both, control, and, 'NPC', patient, cells])].

[sujeto(['Mutations', in, these, genes, are]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, abnormal, 'endosomal-lysosomal', 'trafficking,', resulting, in, the, accumulation, of, multiple, tissue, specific, lipids, in, the, lysosomes])].

[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, increased, 'SIRT6', expression, may, contribute, to, melanoma, development, 'and/or', 'progression,', potentially, via, 'senescence-and', 'autophagy-related', pathways])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Npc1nmf164', allele, of, 'Npc1']), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, mouse, model, for, 'Niemann-Pick', disease, type, 'C1', '(', 'NPC1),', a, genetic, disease, known, to, have, a, widely, variable, phenotype])].

[sujeto(['In', all, 'cases,', lack, of, weight]), verbo([gain]), complemento([and, early, cerebellar, symptoms, of, loss, of, motor, control, were, found])].

[sujeto(['Niemann⁻Pick', type, 'C', '(', 'NPC)', disease, is, a, rare, neurovisceral, cholesterol, storage, disorder, that, arises, from]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, function, mutations, in, the, 'NPC1', or, 'NPC2', genes])].
[sujeto(['Histopathologically,', the, liver, presents, with, large, numbers, of, foam, 'cells;', 'however,', their, role, in, disease, pathogenesis]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, explored, in, depth])].
[sujeto(['GdCl₃', treatment, successfully, blocked, the, endocytic, capacity, of, hepatic, 'Kupffer/foam', measured, by, 'India', ink, 'endocytosis,']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, levels, 'CD68-A', marker, of, 'Kupffer', cells, in, the, 'liver-and', normalized, the, transaminase, levels, in, serum, of, 'NPC', mice, to, a, similar, extent, to, those, obtained, by, genetic, 'Npc1', rescue, of, liver, cells])].
[sujeto(['This', study, opens, the, possibility, of]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([foam, cells, with, gadolinium, or, by, other, means, for, improving, 'NPC', liver, disease])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([14, ',', 15, -, epoxyeicosatrienoic, acid, '(', 14, ',', 15, -, 'EET),', a, cytochrome, 'P450', '(', 'CYP)', 'metabolite,', from, 'hUCB-MSCs', and, the, cerebella, of, 'NPC1-mutant', mice, and, investigated, the, functional, consequence, of, this, metabolite])].

[sujeto(['NPC1', is, a, very, 'rare,', neurovisceral, lipid, storage, 'disorder,', characterized, by, a, deficiency, of, 'Npc1', gene, function, that]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, progressive, neurodegeneration])].

[sujeto(['Our', results, support, that, 'RIPK1', is, an, important, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, the, treatment, of, 'AD'])].

[sujeto(['Atherosclerosis', is, a, complex, disease, resulting, from, the, interaction, of, multiple, 'genes,', including, those]), verbo([causing]), complemento([dyslipidemia])].

[sujeto(['Lecithin', cholesterol, acyltyransferase, '(', 'LCAT)', deficiency, is, a, rare, monogenic, disorder]), verbo([causing]), complemento([lipoprotein, dysregulation, and, multiple, organ, 'dysfunctions,', including, renal, impairment])].
[sujeto(['LCAT', knockout, mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, informative, in, elucidating, mechanisms, of, many, major, clinical, morbid, phenotypes])].
[sujeto(['Extended', characterization, of, the, 'LDL', 'receptor/LCAT', double, knockout, '(', 'Ldlr/Lcat-DKO', or, 'DKO)', mice, had]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, discovery, of, a, number, of, novel, protective, metabolic, 'phenotypes,', including, resistance, to, 'obesity,', nonalcoholic, steatohepatitis, '(', 'NASH)', and, insulin, resistance])].
[sujeto(['The', chow, fed, 'DKO', mice, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([more, insulin, sensitive, than, their, 'Ldlr-KO', controls])].
[sujeto(['DKO', mice, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, develop, ectopic, brown, adipose, tissue, '(', 'BAT)', in, skeletal, muscle])].
[sujeto(['Primed', expression, of, 'PRDM16', and, 'UCP', in, quiescent, satellite, cell]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, 'LCAT', deficiency, synergizes, with, cell, cholesterol, depletion, to, induce, satellite, 'cell-to-BAT', transdifferentiation])].
[sujeto(['Metabolic', phenotyping, of, selective, 'LCAT', null, mice]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, discovery, of, novel, metabolically, protective, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Small', heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP;', 'NR0B2)', is, an, unusual, orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, lacks, a, conventional, 'DNA-binding', domain, and, acts, as, a, modulator, of, transcriptional, activities, of, a, number, of, nuclear, receptors])].
[sujeto(['Herein,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, the, human, 'SHP', promoter, '(', 'hSHP)', is, activated, by, sterol, regulatory, 'element-binding', 'protein-1', '(', 'SREBP-1),', which, regulates, the, expression, of, various, genes, involved, in, cholesterol, and, fatty, acid, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'SREBP-1']), verbo([activated]), complemento([the, human, but, not, mouse, 'SHP', 'promoter,', although, 'SREBP-2', had, little, effect, on, the, 'SHP', promoter, in, 'CV-1', cells])].
[sujeto(['DNase', 'I', 'footprinting,', gel, shift, 'assays,', and, chromatin, immunoprecipitation, assays, demonstrated, that, 'SREBP-1']), verbo([binds]), complemento([directly, to, the, hSHP, promoter])].
[sujeto(['Site-directed', mutagenesis, made, it, clear, that, the, hSHP, promoter, activation, by, 'SREBP-1', is, mostly]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, 'SRE1', '(', -, 186, to, -, 195, 'bp)', in, the, hSHP, 'promoter,', which, is, not, conserved, in, the, mouse, 'SHP', promoter])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'adenovirus-mediated', overexpression, of, 'SREBP-1c/ADD-1']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['SHP', mRNA, expression, and, repressed, 'CYP7A1', expression, in, 'HepG2', cells])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, a, 'four-nucleotide', deletion, '(', -, 195, 'CT-GAdel)', in, the, hSHP, 'promoter,', which, is, reported, to, be, associated, with, altered, body, weight, and, insulin, secretion, in, 'human,', coincides, with, the, 'SRE1'])].
[sujeto(['This', mutation, strongly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([both, basal, and, 'SREBP-1', dependent, activities, of, the, hSHP, 'promoter,', because, of, the, reduced, binding, of, 'SREBP-1', to, the, mutated, 'SRE1'])].
[sujeto(['Small', heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP;', 'NR0B2)', is, an, atypical, orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, lacks, a, conventional, 'DNA', binding, domain, '(', 'DBD)', and, represses, the, transcriptional, activity, of, various, nuclear, receptors])].
[sujeto(['In', vitro, and, in, vivo, protein, interaction, studies, showed, that, 'SHP', physically]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'BETA2/NeuroD,', but, not, its, heterodimer, partner, 'E47'])].
[sujeto(['SHP']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['BETA2/NeuroD-dependent', transactivation, of, an, 'E-box', 'reporter,', whereas, 'SHP', was, unable, to, repress, the, 'E47-mediated', transactivation, and, the, 'E-box', mutant, reporter, activity])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'SHP']), verbo([repressed]), complemento([the, 'BETA2-dependent', activity, of, glucokinase, and, 'cyclin-dependent', kinase, inhibitor, p21, gene, promoters])].
[sujeto(['Gel', shift, and, in, vitro, protein, competition, assays, indicated, that, 'SHP']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([neither, dimerization, nor, 'DNA', binding, of, 'BETA2', and, 'E47'])].
[sujeto(['Rather,', 'SHP', directly]), verbo([repressed]), complemento(['BETA2', transcriptional, activity, and, 'p300-enhanced', 'BETA2/NeuroD', transcriptional, activity, by, inhibiting, interaction, between, 'BETA2', and, coactivator, p300])].
[sujeto(['We', also, showed, that, 'C-terminal', repression, domain, within, 'SHP', is, also]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'BETA2', repression])].
[sujeto(['However,', inhibition, of, 'BETA2', activity, was, not, observed, by, naturally, occurring, human, 'SHP', mutants, that, cannot]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'BETA2/NeuroD'])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'SHP', acts, as, a, novel, corepressor, for, basic, 'helix-loop-helix', transcription, factor, 'BETA2/NeuroD', by, competing, with, coactivator, p300, for, binding, to, 'BETA2/NeuroD', and, by, its, direct, transcriptional, repression, function])].
[sujeto(['The', orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP;', 'NR0B2)', is, an, unusual, orphan, nuclear, receptor, that, lacks, a, conventional, 'DNA-binding', domain, and, acts, as, a, modulator, of, transcriptional, activities, of, a, number, of, nuclear, receptors])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, reported, that, the, orphan, nuclear, receptor, 'ERRgamma', activates, the, 'SHP', promoter])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([found, that, basic, 'helix-loop-helix', '(', 'bHLH)', transcription, 'factors,', the, 'E2A', proteins, '(', 'E47,', 'E12', and, 'E2/5),', activated, the, human, but, not, the, mouse, 'SHP', promoter])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', the, 'tissue-specific', 'E47', heterodimer, partner, 'BETA2']), verbo([repressed]), complemento([the, 'E47-', mediated, transactivation, of, the, human, 'SHP', '(', 'hSHP)', promoter])].
[sujeto(['Using', serial, deletions, and, 'E-box', mutant, constructs, of, the, hSHP, 'promoter,', we, identified, two, 'E-boxes', '(', 'E6', and, 'E7)', as, 'E47-responsive', 'E-boxes,', which, are, not]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([in, the, mouse, 'SHP', promoter])].

[sujeto(['Nuclear-Receptors', represent, ideal]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, the, 'design/synthesis', of, pharmacological, ligands])].
